field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from cttt39 b where @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from cttt39 b where @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 1 and loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: t_tien_nt
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else a.t_tien_nt end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else b.t_tien_nt end

field.name: t_tien_pb_nt
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else a.t_tien_pb_nt end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else b.t_tien_pb_nt end

field.name: t_tien_cl_nt
field.insertValue: case when ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else a.t_tien_nt - a.t_tien_pb_nt end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else b.t_tien_nt - b.t_tien_pb_nt end

field.name: t_tien
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then a.t_tien_nt else round(a.t_tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_nt else round(b.t_tien_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.name: t_tien_pb
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then a.t_tien_pb_nt else round(a.t_tien_pb_nt * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_pb_nt else round(b.t_tien_pb_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.name: t_tien_cl
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then a.t_tien_nt - a.t_tien_pb_nt else round((a.t_tien_nt - a.t_tien_pb_nt) * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_nt - b.t_tien_pb_nt else round((b.t_tien_nt - b.t_tien_pb_nt) * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.name: t_tien_pb0
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then a.t_tien_pb_nt else round(a.t_tien_pb_nt * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_pb_nt else round(b.t_tien_pb_nt * a.ty_gia, @round) end

field.name: t_tien_pb_nt0
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else a.t_tien_pb_nt end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then 0 else b.t_tien_pb_nt end

text.v: Cập nhật chứng từ thanh toán đầu kỳ cho các hóa đơn

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @fields nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @user int, @admin bit, @m int, @year int, @r int, @i int, @count int, @baseCurrency varchar(10), @round int
select @i = 1, @voucherID = 'PC8', @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @year = nam_bd from dmstt select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0' select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @round = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'wrkcolumns' and column_name = 'so_ct'
update @@table set so_ct = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct))) + ltrim(so_ct), ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else b.tk end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'OpeningAPVouchersForInvoices', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
-- Checking &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin if @type = '1' begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_dvcs', a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join cttt30 b on a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct where b.ma_ct = @voucherID &w1;'ma_dvcs'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end end else begin if @type = '1' select top 1 @field = 'ma_dvcs', @r = stt from @@table a join cttt30 b on a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct where b.ma_ct = @voucherID&Error; end &EndErrorMode;
select @count = count(*) from @@table if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from cttt39 b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct)
update @@table set stt_rec = b.stt_rec from @@table a join (select c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct, c.so_ct, min(c.stt_rec) as stt_rec from cttt39 c join @@table d on c.ma_dvcs = d.ma_dvcs and c.ngay_ct = d.ngay_ct and c.so_ct = d.so_ct group by c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct, c.so_ct) b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct
select * into #k from @@table where stt_rec <> ''
delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct)
-- Insert if @count > 0 begin exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @user, '@@table', 'stt_rec', 'stt' update @@table set ty_gia = 1 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency &Inserting;
select @q = 'insert into cttt60(stt_rec, ma_dvcs, loai_ct, ma_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_kh, dien_giai, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_tien_pb_nt, t_tien_pb, da_pb, stt_rec_pb, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2)' select @q = @q + 'select stt_rec, ma_dvcs, loai_ct, ma_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_kh, dien_giai, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, case when ma_nt = ''' + @baseCurrency + ''' then t_tien else t_tien_nt end, t_tien, case when ma_nt = ''' + @baseCurrency + ''' then t_tien_pb else t_tien_pb_nt end, t_tien_pb, 0, '''', status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2' select @q = @q + ' from cttt39 a where exists (select 1 stt_rec from @@table b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec)' exec sp_executesql @q end
-- Update if @type = 1 begin update #k set ty_gia = 1 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency
update cttt39 set @@list from cttt39 a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec
update cttt60 set ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs, ma_kh = b.ma_kh, tk = b.tk, dien_giai = b.dien_giai, ma_nt = b.ma_nt, ty_gia = b.ty_gia, datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @user, t_tt_nt = b.t_tien_nt, t_tt = case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_nt else round(b.t_tien_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end, t_tien_pb_nt = b.t_tien_pb_nt, t_tien_pb = case when b.ma_nt = @baseCurrency then b.t_tien_pb_nt else round(b.t_tien_pb_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end from cttt60 a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end
